title: Data Platform Engineer
description:
**Start****02-02-2025****Duration****4-6 months**
  
**Emagine söker nu efter en Data Platform Engineer till vår fantastiska kund i Stockholm.**  

  

**Start:** 2025-01-27  

**Slut:** 2025-06-31  

**Location:** Stockholm (3 dagar onsite, 2 dagar remote)  

  

**Bakgrund**  

Kunden är stockholmarnas energibolag. Dygnet runt, året om, tryggar vi den växande Stockholmsregionens tillgång till värme, kyla, el samt hantering av avfallstjänster. Idag är fler än 800 000 stockholmare och drygt 400 sjukhus, datahallar och andra verksamheter anslutna till fjärrvärmenätet, kopplat till våra värme- och kraftvärmeanläggningar från Högdalen i söder till Brista i norr. Med gemensam kraft driver vi Stockholm framåt med potential att bli världens första klimatpositiva huvudstad.  

Bakgrund.  

  

På Stockholm Exergi IT bygger vi lösningar som tar oss mot företagets övergripande mål om att leverera de mest effektiva och hållbara energilösningarna för en attraktiv och klimatpositiv Stockholmsregion. Området Data & Analytics är en nyckel för att kunna ge verksamheten verktyg för såväl underbyggt beslutsfattande som effektiv drift av energisystemet. Nu söker vi fler kollegor inom Data och Analys där vi bygger applikationer för hantering och processering av data.  

  

**Projektbeskrivning**  

Projektet syftar till att utöka datat i nuvarande plattform som byggs på Azure med hjälp av Databricks. Över tid ska även en Data Science miljö etableras och all nödvändig analys göras här.

 **Uppdragsbeskrivning**  

Vi söker en erfaren Data Engineer som kan bygga lösningar på Azure med Databricks och kan utveckla och hjälpa teamet inom Dev-Ops-området. Vår organisation är liten, så man behöver ta stort eget ansvar och har samtidigt stor möjlighet att påverka hur vi jobbar med.

 **Obligatoriska kvalifikationer**

* Kunskap i Azure infrastruktur för dataplattformar
* Kunskap/Erfarenhet av utveckling i Python
* Erfarenhet av uppsättning av cloud-infrastruktur för data teams
* Erfarenhet av Data Engineering och datamodellering
* Erfarenhet av implementering av Databricks
* Erfarenhet av automatiserade releaseprocesser och DevOps
* Erfarenhet av utveckling agil utveckling i praktiken
* Erfarenhet av kravarbete och verksamhetsutveckling
* Erfarenhet av Power BI eller annat visualiseringsverktyg

 **Önskade personliga egenskaper**

* Positiv
* Teamorienterad
* Leveransfokus
* Intresserad av verksamhetskrav/behov
* Självgående

title: System Design Engineer
description:
We now have a new requirement and are looking for a consultant colleague with the qualifications listed below. The position is part of our consulting business, which means you will be employed by us and work either with clients or on internal projects and assignments.

*As part of your application, you may be presented to clients/partners as part of the recruitment process. If selected for the assignment, you will be employed by us and work either with clients or on internal projects and assignments as part of our consulting business.*  

  

**Job Description**  

* Be a part of the senior architecture team, and leader of setting long term design strategies of the Embedded SW Platforms for the group.
* Lead our software platform development, based on AUTOSAR and/or Linux and its integration on HPC, serving several operating systems.
* Collaborate with cross-functional teams to gather requirements and translate them into technical designs.
* Lead the integration of the Board support packages (BSP) and configuration of the hypervisor and Guest OS.
* Provide technical guidance and mentorship throughout the development lifecycle.
* Champion continuous improvement initiatives to redefine software platform development processes.

  

**Your Profile (Must-have requirements)**  

* Bachelor's or Master's degree in Computer Science, Software Engineering, or a related field.
* Proven experience as a Software Architect in automotive software development.
* Expertise in AUTOSAR, with at least 10+ years of experience within the Classic domain.
* Expertise in Linux.
* Proficiency in programming languages such as C, C++, or Embedded C.
* Solid understanding of software architecture and design principles, patterns, and best practices.
* Excellent analytical and problem-solving skills.
* Strong communication and collaboration abilities.

  

  

**Application deadline:** 03-02-2025  

  

**About Us**  

We currently employ experienced consultants in areas such as System Development, AI, Machine Learning, Testing, Cloud, Infra DevOps, and IT Project Management.  

  

Working at Deploja is something entirely different from working at an ordinary consulting company—and we are really proud of that. So, what makes us unique?  

  

We simply offer more than just a high salary and greater freedom; that’s just the beginning. With us, you’ll find the work environment and opportunities you deserve. Welcome to Deploja, where the grass is indeed greener!  

  



**Vi erbjuder dig följande, Valet är ditt!**


Exciting assignments with our many clients. We focus on long-term projects, which gives you the opportunity to create value for the client while also developing yourself.


A secure monthly salary – together we’ll agree on a base salary depending on your assignments.


Company car – we encourage you to choose an electric car for a more sustainable future.


Occupational pension and great opportunities for salary conversion.


Vacation – Would you like more than 30 days of vacation, perhaps 60 days?


Private health insurance, accident insurance, and life insurance for increased security.


Skills development – you set your own budget and choose the training you wish to attend.


Quality of life – Are you struggling to balance everyday life and wish to work a little less while still earning as much, if not more?

*We handle applications continuously, and due to the high workload, it's especially important to include a short motivation for the position, explaining how you meet the requirements.*

title: Senior DevOps Engineer
description:
**About Kisi**
==============


We are Kisi, a physical security tech company revolutionizing how businesses access and secure their spaces.

  

Founded in 2012, with headquarters in Brooklyn, an office in Stockholm, and a global team, we create innovative, award-winning hardware and compliance-certified software that enable seamless, cloud-based access to offices, facilities, and buildings. Our mission is to ensure ease of access and remote space management, fostering a future where spaces are securely connected and accessible without boundaries.

  

At Kisi, you’ll join a creative and innovative team with a flat hierarchy, work closely with our co-founders, and enjoy the freedom to work your way with a strong sense of ownership.

  

If you’re passionate about cutting-edge technology and want to be part of a dynamic team that’s making the world more secure and accessible, we want to hear from you!

**About the role**
==================


Kisi is seeking a talented Senior DevOps Engineer to join our dynamic team. The ideal candidate will have a strong background in designing and maintaining cloud infrastructure, automating deployments, and implementing best practices for security and reliability. As a DevOps Engineer at Kisi, you will collaborate with cross-functional teams to optimize build pipelines, streamline development workflows, and ensure the high performance and scalability of our systems.

**What you'll do**
==================

* Architect CI/CD pipelines and automate related workflows across our teams
* Architect scalable and resilient infrastructure for our services to ensure high availability, scalability, and cost-efficiency.
* Implement monitoring, logging, and alerting solutions to proactively identify and resolve operational issues for our services
* Define and enforce cloud security best practices and compliance controls across infrastructure deployments.
* Develop automation scripts and workflows using scripting languages (Python, Bash) and configuration management tools to automate operational tasks and infrastructure management.
* Collaborate with cross-functional teams, including selection/separation decisions and performance reviews.
* Create and maintain comprehensive documentation of infrastructure architecture, configurations, and operational procedures (e.g. incident response plans), where possible in version control repositories for audit and compliance purposes.
* Prepare and present reports on infrastructure performance, metrics, and improvement initiatives to stakeholders and senior management.

**Qualifications**
==================

* Deep knowledge of DevOps principles and best practices
* Very comfortable in at least one programming language (Python / Ruby / Go)
* Strong experience with version control systems and scripting (Git, Bash)
* Hands-on expertise with cloud infrastructure and services (e.g. Google Cloud Platform)
* Extensive experience with containerization and orchestration tools (e.g. Docker, Kubernetes)
* Proficiency in infrastructure-as-code (IaC) tools (Terraform)
* Solid familiarity with monitoring and logging solutions (Prometheus, Grafana, or similar)
* Experience with CI/CD pipelines (e.g. GCP Cloud Build pipelines)
* Excellent problem-solving skills and strong attention to detail
* Outstanding communication and teamwork abilities
* Proven ability to work independently and meet project deadlines

**Your process with us**
========================


Application > CV screening > Intro call (let’s get to know each other!) > Recruitment task > Hiring Manager Interview > Technical Interview > Offer.

  

After successful interviews and the job offer is signed, we will conduct a background check.

title: Karolinska Universitetssjukhuset söker AI-arkitekt till AI-teamet
description:
Karolinska Universitetssjukhuset söker AI-arkitekt till AI-teamet


*Vill du göra skillnad på riktigt varje dag? Hos oss får du vara med och bygga framtidens vårdsystem!*


Du erbjuds

* En meningsfull och utmanande roll i en dynamisk och innovativ miljö
* Stort utrymme för personlig och professionell utveckling.
* Ett stöttande och inkluderande arbetsklimat med ett starkt fokus på samarbete och innovation.
* Möjligheten att arbeta på ett av världens bästa sjukhus
(öppnas i nytt fönster)
med vård i framkant


Självklart får du också ta del av våra generella förmåner som Karolinska Universitetssjukhuset erbjuder dig.


Om tjänsten


Karolinska Universitetssjukhusets uppdrag är att bedriva specialiserad och högspecialiserad sjukvård. Vår vision ”Vi ska bota och lindra imorgon det ingen kan bota och lindra idag” är vägledande när vi arbetar mot tydliga värden för patienter och samhälle och mot medicinska framsteg.


En förutsättning för nästa steg inom den medicinska utvecklingen är förbättrade och moderniserade informationsstrukturer och digitalisering där vi i allt större utsträckning styr produktion och vårdleverans datadrivet och med digital information som beslutsstöd. De lösningar vi utvecklar ger Karolinska möjlighet att leverera mer precisa prognoser, förbättrat beslutstöd för hälso- och sjukvården, optimera resurser och arbetsflöden samt identifiera samband som ger vårdpersonalen bättre underlag för rådgivning och beslut. Detta bidrar i sin tur till ökad trygghet och kvalitet.


Karolinska har en stark IT-avdelning och ska nu etablera ett AI-team som till en början kommer bestå av fem personer. Syftet är att ge oss förmåga att i partnerskap och på egen hand utveckla helt nya lösningar för vårdens digitala system som idag inte finns på marknaden. Vi har stor erfarenhet och kunskap inom vårdens traditionella system men vi behöver bli fler som tänker nytt och som utmanar desamma. Ambition, leveransfokus och kreativitet värdesätts högt och vi behöver både bredd och spets och vi ser gärna att även talanger med mindre erfarenhet växer med oss.


Som AI-arkitekt blir du en del av Karolinskas IT-avdelning och arbetar i vårt nybildade AI-team, vars uppdrag är att utveckla AI-lösningar som skapar verkligt värde för vår verksamhet. Teamet tillämpar agila arbetsmetoder och DevOps-principer. Du får möjlighet att arbeta i en dynamisk miljö med hög kompetens och vara med och skapa lösningar som inte existerar någonstans idag. Du kommer jobba nära vårdens professioner och i ett sammanhang som rör sig snabbt och med stor variation.


Vi söker en AI-arkitekt som, i nära samarbete med andra IT-team, kan använda sin tekniska förmåga att utveckla nya lösningar, underhålla och rulla ut befintliga applikationer i vårdverksamheten. Rollen innefattar både strategiskt och operativt arbete, där du bland annat ansvarar för att utforma och dokumentera arkitekturen. Du förväntas även vara hands-on inom områden som molnlösningar och programmering.


Om du dessutom är intresserad av att ta en Scrum Master-roll inom teamet, ser vi gärna att du nämner detta i din ansökan.


Vi söker dig som

* kan arbeta självständigt såväl som i team
* är empatisk och lyhörd för patienters och kollegors behov
* är nyfiken, kommunikativ och samarbetsvillig
* är engagerad och lösningsorienterad
* trivs när det är full fart och gillar att söka ny kunskap.


Vi kommer att lägga stor vikt vid personliga egenskaper


Kvalifikationer

*Krav:*

* AI-arkitekt med ett till flera års erfarenhet.
* Relevant akademisk utbildning inom datavetenskap, systemvetenskap, eller ett liknande ämne.
* Erfarenhet av att hantera CI/CD-pipelines.
* Erfarenhet av att designa och implementera lösningar i en Azure-miljö.
* Erfarenhet av programmering i språk som Python, .NET, eller liknande.
* Stark problemlösningsförmåga och analytiskt tänkande.
* Ett genuint intresse för att förbättra sjukvården och upplevelsen hos patienter och anställda.
* Förmåga att arbeta både självständigt och i team.
* God förmåga att uttrycka dig både muntligt och skriftligt på svenska och engelska.

*Meriterande:*

* Erfarenhet av infrastruktur som kod, t.ex. med Terraform.
* Erfarenhet av att underhålla maskininlärningsmodeller i en produktionsmiljö.
* Erfarenhet av schemaläggning och underhåll av data och data pipelines.
* Erfarenhet av containerteknologier som Docker och Kubernetes.


Om rekryteringsprocessen


För att din ansökan ska vara komplett ska den innehålla:

* CV
* Personligt brev (frivilligt)
* Utbildningsbevis


Urval och intervjuer sker fortlöpande under ansökningstiden och tjänsten kan komma att tillsättas innan sista ansökningsdag. Provanställning kan komma att tillämpas.

*Varmt välkommen med din ansökan - Tillsammans är vi Karolinska!*


Inför tillsättning av befattning som innefattar vård av barn och ungdom, kontrolleras den som erbjuds tjänsten mot misstanke- och belastningsregistret. Här kan du läsa mer om rekryteringsprocessen och om vilka kontroller som utförs på Karolinska.  

  

Som anställd på Karolinska Universitetssjukhuset kan du komma att krigsplaceras. Läs mer om vad det innebär här.  

  

Om du är eller tidigare har varit anställd i Region Stockholm kommer vi att ta interna referenser från din nuvarande eller tidigare chef, om du blir aktuell för anställning.  

  

Om Karolinska Universitetssjukhuset  

Vi på Karolinska Universitetssjukhuset är stolta över att vi är ett av världens främsta universitetssjukhus. Förutom vårt särskilda ansvar för den högspecialiserade vården i Stockholmsregionen är huvuduppdraget att tillsammans med Karolinska Institutet utbilda framtidens vårdanställda och bedriva världsledande forskning samtidigt som vi fortsätter vårt arbete med att utveckla vården för patientens bästa. Vi arbetar inom en rad olika områden och professioner.
  

  

Vår vision - Vi ska bota och lindra imorgon det ingen kan bota och lindra idag.  

  

Läs gärna mer om oss på karolinska.se och följ oss på sociala medier!


Att söka jobb i Region Stockholm



Vi eftersträvar jämställdhet och jämlikhet på vår arbetsplats och ser gärna sökande med olika bakgrund och förutsättningar.



Vi tar endast emot ansökningar via detta system. Ansök genom att klicka på knappen ”Ansök”. Ansökningar per brev eller e-post beaktas inte. Vi undanber oss direktkontakt med bemannings- och rekryteringsföretag samt säljare av ytterligare jobbannonser.



Vårt rekryteringssystem kan inte hantera anonyma ansökningar eller sökande med skyddade personuppgifter. Om du har skyddade personuppgifter ber vi dig att kontakta den kontaktpersonen som finns angiven i annonsen. Din ansökan kommer då att hanteras utanför rekryteringssystemet. Du bör även vara försiktig med vilken information du lämnar i din ansökan och endast ta med information som är relevant för den aktuella befattningen.



Region Stockholm ansvarar för hälso- och sjukvård, kollektivtrafik, regional utveckling och bidrar till kulturlivet. Varje dag, dygnet runt. I landets snabbaste växande region. Tillsammans skapar vi Europas attraktivaste storstadsregion.

title: Machine Learning Engineer
description:
**Company Description**  

We are a consulting company with a bunch of technology-interested and happy people!  

  

We love technology, we love design and we love quality. Our diversity makes us unique and creates an inclusive and welcoming workplace where each individual is highly valued.  

  

With us, each individual is her/himself and respects others for who they are and we believe that when a fantastic mix of people gather and share their knowledge, experiences, and ideas, we can help our customers on a completely different level.  

  

We are looking for you who want to grow with us!


With us, you have great opportunities to take real steps in your career and the opportunity to take great responsibility.

* GCP requirements:
* Familiar with BigQuery, can code SQL
* Familiar with Cloud composer/airflow
* Familiar with IAM, service account

* Good to have knowledge with Dataflow, K8s, Vertex AI pipeline, Kubeflow pipeline

* Familiar with popular Unix system, know how to install sth in docker.

Docker

DBT

SQL

Deep understanding with Data modeling, system design

* Communication skills with Stakeholders and tech ppl
* Love code review and feedback

  

**Additional Information** **Start:** Immediately  

**Working hours:** 100%  

**Location:** Stockholm, Sweden  

**Form of employment:** Full-time until further notice, we apply 6 months of probationary employment

title: Electronic trading Devops engineer - Equities Platform team | SEB, Solna
description:
**About the role:**  

You will work in a fast-paced work environment and contribute to the continuous delivery of the Equities Execution trading systems.
  
Provide end user support and have a very close collaboration with the trading desks and other business stakeholders
  
Troubleshooting, system integration, maintenance, installation and configuration for our Equity execution trading systems.
  
Implementing and overseeing continuous monitoring to ensure the stability and efficiency of our production environment.
  
Collaborating with external vendors, cross-functional teams, other development units to deliver comprehensive solutions.
  
  

**Our Ideal Candidate:**  

Relevant academic degree with focus on computer and systems science or within the financial sector.
  
You have at least 2 years of experience from working in a support role and with system integration.
  
Experience of working with trading products within Equities, Fixed Income or FX is meritorious.
  
Knowledge of working with Trading applications, platforms, protocols, & containers.
  
**Especially:** Ullink, network, FIX-Protocol, Exchange connections, Fidessa, Linux, OpenShift and Electronic Trading will also be meriting.
  
You need to be a service-minded team-player eager to learn new things and able to take on multiple tasks.
  
You have a customer focused attitude, is driven, structured and self-going
  
You are highly motivated, positive and have a strong sense of responsibility and commitment.
  
You have experience from or an interest in the Financial industry.
  
You are proactive and contribute with ideas and suggested improvements on our platform and way of working.
  
You have excellent communication abilities in both Swedish and English.
  
You are familiar with the agile way of working.
  
  

**What we offer:**  

Innovative project with highly motivating colleagues
  
Exciting work environment with very close business contact
  
Extensive training and great learning opportunities
  
Agile and modern ways of working
  
  

Do you want to be a part of SEB?​
  
Welcome to our inclusive culture, where our shared values inspire and uplift our team. We celebrate diversity and strive to ensure every employee feels seen, heard, and valued. ​
  
  

Since we select candidates continuously, feel free to send in your application today, but no later than 2025-02-21.
  
​
  
Learn more about working at SEB www.sebgroup.com/career​
  
It is our fundamental belief that inclusion and diversity is crucial for our future success. We strive to have an inclusive, value-driven culture where employees feel valued, respected and involved irrespective of who they are, what they believe or where they come from.

title: Software Development Engineer in Test
description:
At IO Interactive we are currently looking for a Software Developer in Test (SDET) to become an integral member of our dynamic Backbone team.
  
We are hiring a hybrid Developer/QA who will build tools to reach the desired level of functionality, stability, and usability of our proprietary Glacier game engine. This is a great opportunity to contribute to thrilling AAA games, including Hitman and a new James Bond game.
  
As a Software Development Engineer in Test on the Tech QA Team, you will collaborate with QAs and developers working on our cutting-edge Glacier engine. You will play an active role in enhancing the quality of automated tests and ensuring that tools and processes are in place to continually improve quality across the team.
  
The ideal candidate will be an experienced software development engineer who is naturally inquisitive and has an interest in best practices and QA. You should be comfortable implementing tests and building ad-hoc tools in C# and C++.
  
This is a permanent position based in one of our studios, with the option to work from home up to two days per week.
  
  

**What you will do:**  

Collaborate with developers and QA teams to deliver high-quality software.
  
Champion continuous improvement and DevOps practices.
  
Help choose or develop tools and test frameworks to improve the quality of our code.
  
Work closely with developers to provide early feedback about new features and functionality.
  
  

**Who you are:**  

A minimum of 3 years of experience as a dedicated SDET on large, complex software projects.
  
Proficient in professional development with C++ and C#.
  
Passionate about both testing and software development.
  
An excellent communicator with strong verbal and written skills in English.
  
  

**Bonus points:**  

A bachelor's degree in computer science or equivalent.
  
Experience in game development.
  
Expertise in designing and developing test frameworks.
  
  

**Who we are:**  

IO Interactive is an independent videogame development and publishing company with studios in Copenhagen, Malmö, Barcelona, Istanbul and Brighton. As the creative force behind some of the most talked-about multiplatform video games in the last decade, we are committed to creating unforgettable characters and experiences – all powered by our award-winning, proprietary Glacier technology.
  
We know that to achieve those goals, we need courage, talented people and a great working environment – and we do our utmost to have all of that. Across our multiple studios, we’re working on several projects. Crucially though, we’re all one team. We value the work and impact that each person brings to the table and we actively encourage new ideas, whilst listening to your insights along the way.
  
We have a dedicated team of People Managers, who look after you as an individual and as an employee. With more than 40 nationalities, we know that everyone is different and we are proud to have a reputation for being a friendly workplace with highly-talent people.
  
Learn more about our Glacier engine.
  
#LI-GK1

title: Senior SAP Test Manager Remote ( Europe )
description:
**Join Our Team VIPAS AB as a Senior SAP Test Manager**

* **Location:** **Remote** (Europe) with occasional travel as needed.
* **Client Location:** Gothenburg, Sweden
* **Languages Required:** English (Proficient)

  

**Do you have what it takes to thrive in the vibrant world of IT consulting? VIPAS AB, a burgeoning company, proudly invites you to embark on your next engaging project as our Senior SAP Test Manager**

**About VIPAS :**


Imagine a world where your business technology perfectly aligns with your goals—efficient, scalable, and innovative. At VIPAS AB, that’s exactly what we strive to create. As an IT consulting company, we don’t just offer services; we deliver tailored solutions using cutting-edge technologies like Java and Python. Our team is well-versed in software development, DevOps, and engineering, bringing years of experience and expertise. Think of us as your trusted guide, leading your organization through the landscape of modern tech adoption, ensuring every step is taken with confidence and foresight.

**Job Description:**


You will be working on a **large-scale SAP implementation project for a client**. Your role involves planning, directing, and managing all testing activities, ensuring smooth execution of **functional, system, and integration testing** while maintaining high-quality standards throughout the program lifecycle.

 **Key Responsibilities:**

* Develop and implement **test strategies**, test plans, and detailed schedules.
* Define **test cases**, coordinate the setup of test environments,& manage test data.
* Review & ensure the quality of test deliverables, including test concepts, scripts, reports, and documentation.
* Oversee **test progress tracking, reporting**, and resource allocation.
* Ensure effective **communication and collaboration** with stakeholders, including internal teams & external vendors.
* Identify risks, provide **problem-solving solutions**, drive successful test execution.
* Lead and mentor the testing team to ensure alignment with project objectives.
* Manage test automation strategies & ensure the adoption of best testing practices.
* 

**Requirements:**

* **Extensive experience in SAP test management**, including **SAP S/4HANA**.
* Proven track record in leading and managing test teams in large-scale SAP projects.
* Strong **leadership and stakeholder engagement** skills.
* Expertise in defining and executing test strategies, selecting appropriate test tools, and setting up test environments.
* Excellent communication and problem-solving abilities.

**Why Join Us?**



Vipas AB offers attractive employment packages for IT consultants, aligned with the Teknikföretagen (Almega) collective agreement. Clients Working with us provides opportunities in diverse industries, allowing you flexibility and growth. If you’re driven and eager to face new challenges, join the VIPAS family.


You'll be part of an innovative team driving the future of telecom, Automotive, Retail, and Banking. If you're ready to take on challenging projects and grow your career in a cutting-edge environment, this is the opportunity for you!

**Apply Now & Please feel free to reach me at sandhya@vipas.se**

**Note:** Please do apply if you have **Sweden PR/ citizenship OR a Sweden work permit.**

 **How to Apply:**


Interested candidates are encouraged to apply by submitting their resume and cover letter. Join us in driving innovation in the VIPAS AB!


Please note! We offer continuously. That means that we sometimes remove the assignments before the deadline. If you are interested we recommend that you apply immediately.

title: Senior CI/CD Engineer
description:
Are you ready to take your cloud engineering skills to the next level? We are currently scanning the world to find the best cloud engineers to join our team. With us at Knowit, you get the opportunity to learn, grow, and be a frontrunner in the Nordic cloud market.

**What will you be doing?**


As a cloud engineer, you will help develop cloud environments and tools for a variety of clients.  

This means that you work to support our customers with different solutions in the cloud domain from CI/CD-Pipelines to set-up of new cloud environments. We always work team-based so even if you haven’t worked with all aspects we might still be interested.  

Even though we are currently focusing on recruiting individuals with public cloud skills such as Azure or AWS; If you’re an expert in private and on-premises solutions, we still want you to apply!

**Who are you?**  

You are passionate about and have experience in some of the following areas:


DevOps methods (e.g. Infrastructure as Code, Versioning, CI/CD pipelines, artifact management, repository management, observability, etc).


Public cloud with related services (Primary Azure or AWS)


Container-based solutions (e.g. Docker/Kubernetes/EKS/ECS/etc)


Automation using modern tools and languages (e.g. Python/AWS Lambda/Azure function/etc)


3+ years of experience within Cloud

**You also have:**


Excellent communication skills


An interest in working both holistically and hands-on


You probably also have a keen interest and experience in some of:


Cyber security


Software development (e.g. Java/.net/rust/go/swift/C++/ etc.)


As a Knowit consultant, you will be the front person for the company in interacting with our customers.


We value personal qualities, communicative skills, and social competence.  

This gives us flexible teams and a great company culture where we all work well together and feel the support from our peers.

**About us**


Knowit offers a chance to achieve professional goals through challenging tasks and positive leadership. Working with customers at Knowit Connectivity provides opportunities to develop skills while enjoying the job. The workplace is fast-paced, fun, and inspiring with a great team spirit that works towards making a difference for the company and customers. There are many chances for personal development through innovative projects and skill development models. Knowit's corporate culture values sustainability and is built on consensus, openness, honesty, and respect for individual value and dignity. Knowit Connectivity specializes in exciting areas such as self-driving cars, infotainment systems, and 5G development, with expertise in embedded, cloud, and application domains.

**Application**


We have an ongoing selection of applications, so please apply for the position as soon as possible! Please include at least 3 cloud projects you have worked on in your CV. Do you have questions? Please contact our recruiter David Blaag Nilsson, David.blaag-nilsson@knowit.se

title: DevOps Engineer
description:

title: Software Development Engineer in Test
description:
### **Odevo and KWPMC**


Odevo is a group of brands working together to bring innovation to the property management industry. We're committed to revolutionizing the industry with software solutions that make managing properties easier, more efficient, and more effective. We have established ourselves in the U.S. with KW Property & Management Consulting, a leading Florida-based property manager, joining the Odevo group. KWPMC has achieved organic growth since its inception, with over 80,000 homes under management and 2,000 employees, and is currently developing its own cutting-edge digital platform. To continue our ambitious growth journey, we are looking for more great people to join us and work with Odevo and KWPMC to build market-leading property management software products. Are you one of them?


#### **About the role**

In this role, you’ll be an integral part of our mission to deliver high-quality software products. Working in a collaborative, agile environment, you’ll design, develop, and execute automated tests that ensure our products meet the highest standards. Your work will directly contribute to creating a culture of continuous improvement and excellence, helping us push boundaries in the property management technology space.

**Your Key Responsibilities Will Include**


* Designing and developing automated test frameworks and scripts to ensure robust software quality.
* Implementing performance and load testing strategies to validate application scalability.
* Integrating automated tests into CI/CD pipelines and monitoring their performance.
* Collaborating with developers to identify test coverage needs and troubleshoot issues.
* Analyzing test results to provide insights into product readiness and quality.
* Leading cross-team quality initiatives and mentoring team members in test automation best practices.

#### **Who You Are**

You are a proactive problem solver with a passion for quality and innovation. With a detail-oriented mindset and a collaborative approach, you thrive in an agile, fast-paced environment where teamwork is key. You take pride in delivering excellent results and are eager to drive quality at every stage of development. Your strong communication skills enable you to work effectively with diverse teams, and your ability to adapt and learn ensures you stay ahead in the field. You are fluent in Swedish and English.

**Experience**


* At least 3 years of experience in test automation.
* Proficiency in programming languages such as C#, and JavaScript.
* Hands-on experience with test automation tools such as Cypress, Selenium, Postman.
* A solid understanding of performance testing, CI/CD pipelines, and cloud platforms in Azure.
* Familiarity with Linux/Unix, shell scripting, and DevOps practices.


**What We Offer**


* Professional growth - to work with the most talented developers in the industry.
* Modern technology - we invest in the latest technologies and tools and encourage our team members to share their ideas and take ownership of their work.
* Innovation - to work on exciting projects that push the boundaries of our industry and make a real impact.
Commitment to quality - a dynamic and forward-thinking company that values profitable and long-term product development.  
* 

**Location**  

Our office is on the top floor in the newly built Sthlm 04, which offers stunning views over Stockholm.  

  



**Excited?**  

Join Odevo’s journey toward excellence! If this sounds like your next career move, we’d love to hear from you.  

  



**Why we formed Odevo**  

**About Odevo**  

**Our Software**

title: Senior DevSecOps Engineer
description:
Vi har nu ett nytt behov och söker därför en konsultkollega med nedan kvalifikationer. Tjänsten är en del av vår konsultverksamhet vilket innebär att du blir anställd av oss och arbetar hos kund alt. interna projekt och åtaganden.

 **Jobbeskrivning**  

* Utveckla och underhålla CI/CD-pipelines med verktyg som Jenkins, Bitbucket och Artifactory.


- Automatisera bygg-, test- och distributionsprocesser med hjälp av Bash, Python, Java, Django eller Go.  

* Övervaka och felsöka problem relaterade till byggfel, anslutningsproblem och prestandaflaskhalsar.
* Arbeta med Docker, Podman, Kubernetes och Ansible för containerisering och orkestrering.
* Samarbeta med DevOps-teamet för att förbättra prestanda, säkerhet och skalbarhet i systemet.
* Hålla dig uppdaterad om nya teknologier och verktyg inom DevSecOps för att optimera arbetsflöden.

  

**Din profil (Skall krav)**  

* 8–12 års erfarenhet av DevSecOps och arbete med CI/CD-verktyg.
* Stark kompetens inom Linux-baserade system och infrastruktur.
* Gedigen erfarenhet av automatisering och scripting i språk som Bash, Python, Java, Django eller Go.
* Erfarenhet av containerisering och orkestrering med Docker, Podman, Kubernetes eller Ansible.
* En analytisk och problemlösningsorienterad inställning med fokus på detaljer.
* God kommunikationsförmåga och en samarbetsinriktad arbetsstil.
* Examen inom datavetenskap, teknik eller ett relaterat område.

  

**Sista ansökningdatum:** 03-02-2025 **Om Deploja**  

  

Vi sysselsätter idag erfarna konsulter, inom bl.a. Systemutveckling, Test, Arkitektur, IT-Projektledning, IT-Säkerhet.  

  

Att jobba på Deploja är något helt annat än att arbeta på ett vanligt konsultbolag – och det är vi riktigt stolta över. Vad är det då som gör oss unika?

  

Vi erbjuder helt enkelt mer än bara hög lön och större frihet, det är bara början. Hos oss hittar du den arbetsmiljö och de möjligheter du förtjänar. Välkommen till Deploja, där gräset faktiskt är grönare!

 **Vi erbjuder dig följande, Valet är ditt!**


Spännande uppdrag hos våra många kunder. Vi fokuserar på långsiktiga uppdrag, vilket ger dig möjlighet att skapa värde för kunden samtidigt som du utvecklas själv.


En trygg månadslön – tillsammans bestämmer vi en grundlön baserad på dina uppdrag.


Tjänstebil – vi uppmuntrar dig att välja en elbil för en mer hållbar framtid.


Tjänstepension och stora möjligheter till löneväxling.


Semester - Önskar du mer än 30 dagar semester, kanske 60 dagar?


Privat sjukvårdsförsäkring, olycksfallsförsäkring och livförsäkring för ökad trygghet.

  

Kompetensutveckling – du får själv sätta din budget och välja vilka utbildningar du vill delta i.


Livskvalitet - Har du kanske svårt att få ihop pusslet i vardagen och önskar arbeta lite mindre och ändå kunna tjäna lika mycket om inte mer?

 *Vi hanterar ansökningar löpande, med hänsyn till höga arbetstrycket är det extra viktigt med en kort motivering för tjänsten som förklarar hur man möter kraven.*

title: Application Architect
description:
We now have a new requirement and are looking for a consultant colleague with the qualifications listed below. The position is part of our consulting business, which means you will be employed by us and work either with clients or on internal projects and assignments.

*As part of your application, you may be presented to clients/partners as part of the recruitment process. If selected for the assignment, you will be employed by us and work either with clients or on internal projects and assignments as part of our consulting business.*  

  

**Job Description**  

  

1. Application Architecture Design:

* Design and develop scalable, secure, and high-performing application architectures for credit risk management systems.
* Define application workflows for credit risk assessment, credit scoring, portfolio monitoring, and risk reporting.
* Incorporate big data platforms (e.g., Hadoop, Spark, Kafka) into application designs to handle large-scale data ingestion, processing, and storage.


2. Technology Implementation:

* Lead the development and integration of applications on big data platforms (Cloudera).
* Oversee ETL processes to manage credit risk data ingestion, transformation, and analysis from multiple sources.


3. Collaboration and Stakeholder Management:

* Collaborate with credit risk analysts, and business stakeholders to define system requirements and ensure solutions meet business objectives.
* Work closely with data architects, developers and infrastructure teams to implement and optimize solutions.


4. Performance Optimization:

* Optimize applications for low-latency, high-throughput processing of credit risk data.
* Conduct regular performance tuning of systems and applications, ensuring scalability for future data growth.


5. Data Governance and Security:

* Ensure that solutions adhere to data governance and security protocols, including data masking, encryption, and access controls.
* Establish processes for auditing and tracking sensitive credit risk data.


6. Continuous Improvement:

* Stay updated on advancements in big data technologies, credit risk methodologies, and regulatory requirements.
* Propose enhancements to existing systems and recommend new tools or frameworks to improve capabilities.

  

**Your Profile (Must-have requirements)**

  

Education:

* Bachelor’s or Master’s degree in Computer Science, Information Systems, Finance, or a related field.


Experience:

* Extensive experience in application architecture and system design, particularly in the financial domain.
* Proven track record in designing solutions for credit risk management and big data platforms.


Technical Skills:

* Expertise in big data ecosystems (e.g., Hadoop, Spark, Hive, Impala).
* Strong knowledge of programming languages (e.g., Scala, Python).
* Familiarity with distributed computing frameworks & orchestration tool (e.g., Airflow).
* Proficiency in database systems (SQL) and ETL frameworks.


Domain Knowledge:

* Good overview of credit risk models, regulatory requirements, and financial risk metrics.


Soft Skills:

* Strong analytical and problem-solving skills.
* Excellent communication and interpersonal skills to work with cross-functional teams.
* Leadership capabilities to guide teams and ensure project delivery.


Preferred Qualifications:

* Familiarity with financial regulations like Basel & IFRS 9.

  

  

  

**Application deadline:** 04-02-2025  

  

**About Us**  

We currently employ experienced consultants in areas such as System Development, AI, Machine Learning, Testing, Cloud, Infra DevOps, and IT Project Management.  

  

Working at Deploja is something entirely different from working at an ordinary consulting company—and we are really proud of that. So, what makes us unique?  

  

We simply offer more than just a high salary and greater freedom; that’s just the beginning. With us, you’ll find the work environment and opportunities you deserve. Welcome to Deploja, where the grass is indeed greener!  


  



**Vi erbjuder dig följande, Valet är ditt!**


Exciting assignments with our many clients. We focus on long-term projects, which gives you the opportunity to create value for the client while also developing yourself.


A secure monthly salary – together we’ll agree on a base salary depending on your assignments.


Company car – we encourage you to choose an electric car for a more sustainable future.


Occupational pension and great opportunities for salary conversion.


Vacation – Would you like more than 30 days of vacation, perhaps 60 days?


Private health insurance, accident insurance, and life insurance for increased security.


Skills development – you set your own budget and choose the training you wish to attend.


Quality of life – Are you struggling to balance everyday life and wish to work a little less while still earning as much, if not more?

*We handle applications continuously, and due to the high workload, it's especially important to include a short motivation for the position, explaining how you meet the requirements.*

title: Tech Lead – .NET & Azure Specialist
description:
Are you a seasoned developer with strong technical leadership skills and a passion for building scalable, high-quality applications? We’re looking for a **Tech Lead** to drive innovation and lead development within our iTicket team. This role offers an exciting opportunity to design and enhance a world-class platform for tours and activities, leveraging the latest .NET and Azure technologies.

**Key Responsibilities**  

In this role, you’ll work closely with a skilled team to enhance our end-to-end solutions and stabilize our POS technology as we transition to a more integrated app ecosystem. You’ll be pivotal in developing robust components on the Android side, optimizing them for reusability across various applications, entry systems, and new self-service solutions. Additionally, you’ll play a key role in bridging our core system and POS functionalities, working alongside .NET developers from other teams to maintain seamless integration and stability.


**As a Tech Lead, you will**:

* Lead the design, development, and maintenance of robust backend services using .NET Core and related technologies.
* Architect and implement scalable solutions on Microsoft Azure, ensuring reliability and performance.
* Collaborate with cross-functional teams to integrate POS systems and optimize end-to-end platform capabilities.
* Guide the team in adopting best practices in coding, testing, and deployment processes.
* Mentor and support developers, fostering a culture of continuous improvement and innovation.
* Play a critical role in ensuring seamless integration between backend systems, APIs, and external services.

  

**Your Profile**

* **Proven Tech Leadership**: At least 7+ years of experience in backend development with a demonstrated ability to lead teams, drive technical strategy, and deliver high-quality solutions.
* **Technical Expertise**:
	+ Strong proficiency in **C#, .NET Core**, and relational databases (SQL Server).
	+ Experience with **Azure services** such as Azure Functions, App Services, Azure DevOps, and cloud architecture.
	+ Familiarity with REST APIs, modern SPA frameworks, and automated testing tools.
* **Problem Solver**: Ability to design scalable, maintainable solutions and tackle complex challenges.
* **Team Player**: Excellent collaboration and communication skills, with a proactive and solution-oriented mindset.

  

**Why Join Us?**  

We’re excited to add a senior developer who brings both expertise and a genuine desire to improve our platform’s performance and reliability. As part of our dynamic team, you’ll contribute directly to shaping the future of our offerings and bringing fresh ideas to life. If you’re ready to make a difference in a growing company with a friendly, innovative work environment, we’d love to hear from you!


**About Visit Group**  

Visit Group is a leading European software provider specializing in technology solutions for the tourism industry. Founded in 1999 and headquartered in Gothenburg, Sweden, the company has grown to become a leader in the travel technology sector. We offer a comprehensive digital ecosystem that includes property management system, booking system, ticketing and e-commerce platform and travel switches for various segments of the tourism industry. Our product portfolio includes Citybreak, BookVisit, iTicket, VisBook, WebX and Olery.


With over 20 years of experience, we serve more than 3,000 customers across 25 countries, including tourism organizations, accommodations, tours, and activity vendors worldwide. Our solutions enable inbound tourism businesses, such as hotels, ski resorts, tour operators, and destination marketing companies, to sell, combine, and distribute tourism products sourced from hundreds of external inventory platforms.

title: Junior Test Engineer
description:
10 Chambers is a fully funded scale-up game studio backed by Tencent and based in the beautiful city of Stockholm, Sweden. We are an ambitious, creative, and collaborative team with a lifelong love for games.


We are now working on our next project, a cooperative heist FPS in a techno-thriller setting - Den of Wolves. Originated and directed by Ulf Andersson, the game designer of Payday 1 & 2.


Have you recently completed a degree in Computer Science or Game Development, or gained equivalent experience? We're looking for a **junior test engineer** to join our DevOps team in Stockholm!

  

As a Junior Test Engineer within our DevOps team, you'll learn to work with our backend systems and help ensure the reliability and performance of our game.

**Your Daily Tasks**

* Create and maintain test cases for backend services
* Support the development of automated test scripts
* Assist with API testing and performance monitoring
* Help maintain test documentation

**What You Bring**

* Python programming skills
* Eagerness to learn about backend systems
* Problem-solving mindset
* Passion for gaming and understanding of game mechanics
* Good communication skills in English

**Bonus**

* Experience with Python testing frameworks
* SQL knowledge
* Familiarity with Go programming language
* Experience with Perforce
* Experience with Unity game engine
* Interest in cloud platforms and CI/CD concepts

**Why join 10 Chambers?**

* Be part of an ambitious team which also practices work-life balance through working hours and generous health benefits
* Learn as part of a collaborative team and grow with a fast-expanding company
* Opportunity to make a real difference to the success of 10 Chambers
* The position is on-site in our Stockholm office

**About us**


We want an open and inclusive work environment where everybody is valued, feels safe, is treated equally and with respect. At 10 Chambers we welcome everyone regardless of gender, transgender identity or expression, ethnicity, religion or other belief, disability, sexual orientation, or age. Today our team consists of 20+ different nationalities and the office language is English

*10 Chambers does not use AI to make the first selection of candidates*. HR and the recruiting manager read each application.

*As part of your application, you may be presented to clients/partners as part of the recruitment process. If selected for the assignment, you will be employed by us and work either with clients or on internal projects and assignments as part of our consulting business.*

title: Karolinska Universitetssjukhuset söker AI-arkitekt till AI-teamet
description:
*Vill du göra skillnad på riktigt varje dag? Hos oss får du vara med och bygga framtidens vårdsystem!*

### **Du erbjuds**

* En meningsfull och utmanande roll i en dynamisk och innovativ miljö
* Stort utrymme för personlig och professionell utveckling.
* Ett stöttande och inkluderande arbetsklimat med ett starkt fokus på samarbete och innovation.
* Möjligheten att arbeta på ett av världens bästa sjukhus med vård i framkant


Självklart får du också ta del av våra generella förmåner som Karolinska Universitetssjukhuset erbjuder dig.

### **Om tjänsten**


Karolinska Universitetssjukhusets uppdrag är att bedriva specialiserad och högspecialiserad sjukvård. Vår vision ”Vi ska bota och lindra imorgon det ingen kan bota och lindra idag” är vägledande när vi arbetar mot tydliga värden för patienter och samhälle och mot medicinska framsteg.


En förutsättning för nästa steg inom den medicinska utvecklingen är förbättrade och moderniserade informationsstrukturer och digitalisering där vi i allt större utsträckning styr produktion och vårdleverans datadrivet och med digital information som beslutsstöd. De lösningar vi utvecklar ger Karolinska möjlighet att leverera mer precisa prognoser, förbättrat beslutstöd för hälso- och sjukvården, optimera resurser och arbetsflöden samt identifiera samband som ger vårdpersonalen bättre underlag för rådgivning och beslut. Detta bidrar i sin tur till ökad trygghet och kvalitet.


Karolinska har en stark IT-avdelning och ska nu etablera ett AI-team som till en början kommer bestå av fem personer. Syftet är att ge oss förmåga att i partnerskap och på egen hand utveckla helt nya lösningar för vårdens digitala system som idag inte finns på marknaden. Vi har stor erfarenhet och kunskap inom vårdens traditionella system men vi behöver bli fler som tänker nytt och som utmanar desamma. Ambition, leveransfokus och kreativitet värdesätts högt och vi behöver både bredd och spets och vi ser gärna att även talanger med mindre erfarenhet växer med oss.


Som AI-arkitekt blir du en del av Karolinskas IT-avdelning och arbetar i vårt nybildade AI-team, vars uppdrag är att utveckla AI-lösningar som skapar verkligt värde för vår verksamhet. Teamet tillämpar agila arbetsmetoder och DevOps-principer. Du får möjlighet att arbeta i en dynamisk miljö med hög kompetens och vara med och skapa lösningar som inte existerar någonstans idag. Du kommer jobba nära vårdens professioner och i ett sammanhang som rör sig snabbt och med stor variation.


Vi söker en AI-arkitekt som, i nära samarbete med andra IT-team, kan använda sin tekniska förmåga att utveckla nya lösningar, underhålla och rulla ut befintliga applikationer i vårdverksamheten. Rollen innefattar både strategiskt och operativt arbete, där du bland annat ansvarar för att utforma och dokumentera arkitekturen. Du förväntas även vara hands-on inom områden som molnlösningar och programmering.


Om du dessutom är intresserad av att ta en Scrum Master-roll inom teamet, ser vi gärna att du nämner detta i din ansökan.

### **Vi söker dig som**

* kan arbeta självständigt såväl som i team
* är empatisk och lyhörd för patienters och kollegors behov
* är nyfiken, kommunikativ och samarbetsvillig
* är engagerad och lösningsorienterad
* trivs när det är full fart och gillar att söka ny kunskap.


Vi kommer att lägga stor vikt vid personliga egenskaper

### **Kvalifikationer**

*Krav:*

* AI-arkitekt med ett till flera års erfarenhet.
* Relevant akademisk utbildning inom datavetenskap, systemvetenskap, eller ett liknande ämne.
* Erfarenhet av att hantera CI/CD-pipelines.
* Erfarenhet av att designa och implementera lösningar i en Azure-miljö.
* Erfarenhet av programmering i språk som Python, .NET, eller liknande.
* Stark problemlösningsförmåga och analytiskt tänkande.
* Ett genuint intresse för att förbättra sjukvården och upplevelsen hos patienter och anställda.
* Förmåga att arbeta både självständigt och i team.
* God förmåga att uttrycka dig både muntligt och skriftligt på svenska och engelska.

*Meriterande:*

* Erfarenhet av infrastruktur som kod, t.ex. med Terraform.
* Erfarenhet av att underhålla maskininlärningsmodeller i en produktionsmiljö.
* Erfarenhet av schemaläggning och underhåll av data och data pipelines.
* Erfarenhet av containerteknologier som Docker och Kubernetes.

### **Om rekryteringsprocessen**

**För att din ansökan ska vara komplett ska den innehålla:**

* CV
* Personligt brev (frivilligt)
* Utbildningsbevis


Urval och intervjuer sker fortlöpande under ansökningstiden och tjänsten kan komma att tillsättas innan sista ansökningsdag. Provanställning kan komma att tillämpas.

*Varmt välkommen med din ansökan - Tillsammans är vi Karolinska!*


Inför tillsättning av befattning som innefattar vård av barn och ungdom, kontrolleras den som erbjuds tjänsten mot misstanke- och belastningsregistret. Här kan du läsa mer om rekryteringsprocessen och om vilka kontroller som utförs på Karolinska.  

  

Som anställd på Karolinska Universitetssjukhuset kan du komma att krigsplaceras. Läs mer om vad det innebär här.  

  

Om du är eller tidigare har varit anställd i Region Stockholm kommer vi att ta interna referenser från din nuvarande eller tidigare chef, om du blir aktuell för anställning.  

  

**Om Karolinska Universitetssjukhuset**  

Vi på Karolinska Universitetssjukhuset är stolta över att vi är ett av världens främsta universitetssjukhus. Förutom vårt särskilda ansvar för den högspecialiserade vården i Stockholmsregionen är huvuduppdraget att tillsammans med Karolinska Institutet utbilda framtidens vårdanställda och bedriva världsledande forskning samtidigt som vi fortsätter vårt arbete med att utveckla vården för patientens bästa. Vi arbetar inom en rad olika områden och professioner.
  

  

Vår vision - Vi ska bota och lindra imorgon det ingen kan bota och lindra idag.  

  

Läs gärna mer om oss på karolinska.se och följ oss på sociala medier!


Att söka jobb i Region Stockholm Vi eftersträvar jämställdhet och jämlikhet på vår arbetsplats och ser gärna sökande med olika bakgrund och förutsättningar. Vi tar endast emot ansökningar via detta system. Ansök genom att klicka på knappen ”Ansök”. Ansökningar per brev eller e-post beaktas inte. Vi undanber oss direktkontakt med bemannings- och rekryteringsföretag samt säljare av ytterligare jobbannonser. Vårt rekryteringssystem kan inte hantera anonyma ansökningar eller sökande med skyddade personuppgifter. Om du har skyddade personuppgifter ber vi dig att kontakta den kontaktpersonen som finns angiven i annonsen. Din ansökan kommer då att hanteras utanför rekryteringssystemet. Du bör även vara försiktig med vilken information du lämnar i din ansökan och endast ta med information som är relevant för den aktuella befattningen. Region Stockholm ansvarar för hälso- och sjukvård, kollektivtrafik, regional utveckling och bidrar till kulturlivet. Varje dag, dygnet runt. I landets snabbaste växande region. Tillsammans skapar vi Europas attraktivaste storstadsregion. Läs mer om hur det är att jobba hos oss i Region Stockholm

**Job Description:**

**At Hitachi Energy our purpose is advancing a sustainable energy future for all. We bring power to our homes, schools, hospitals, and factories. Join us and work with fantastic people, while learning and developing yourself on projects that have a real impact to our communities and society. Bring your passion, bring your energy, and be part of a global team that appreciates a simple truth: Diversity + Collaboration = Great Innovation**

*Do you want to enable green energy transition, and together with colleagues be a part of building and deliver customized control systems to meet our customer’s and the world's needs for sustainable, flexible, and secure energy? Then we are eager to meet you!*

*We are now looking for a Power System Engineer for the control and protection department.*

*You will be a part of our highly skilled Basic Conceptual Design team within the department TKST.*

*This department have one of the most important roles within the HVDC organization. Here we draw and set up the architectural foundations for the Control & Protection delivery, based on the customer requirements, SLD etc. The group is mostly focusing on engineering in the early stages of the projects but also contributing with expert support throughout the whole project execution.*

*You will provide with your technical knowledge withing the Basic Conceptual Design phase in the Control & Protection area and coordinate the work with project managers and other technical teams within the organization. And when needed, participate in customer meetings.*

*Our team culture is flexible and cooperative with highest regards for safety and occupational health.*

*We value your potential and personal commitment equal to experience, so do not hesitate to send your application even though you don’t meet all the requirements. A team with fantastic collaboration is waiting for you to join!*

*I who will be your manager is Torbjörn Andersson. For me it is important to build and sustain a healthy and exiting work environment, together with the team. If we feel excitement and joy when we come to work, we are well equipped and ready do take on any task! I appreciate and invite to communication at any times. Dialogues in all shapes and forms are key to good working environment and successful project execution.*

*Apply today and be a part of the exciting HVDC journey that enables a sustainable green energy future for us all. Looking forward hearing from you!*

**Your responsibilities**

* You will be a part of the HVDC team and be responsible for the Basic Conceptual Design work for our control and protection system
* Work together with our customers to ensure our delivery is according to their requirements and standards
* Collaborating and networking with other engineering functions, sharing best practice across different projects
* To be proactive in finding solutions & to continuously improve the process
* Coordinating technical interfaces towards other domains during the execution
* Assessing the risks in the proposed design and take required actions accordingly

**Your background**

* Bachelor or master’s degree in Power Systems or electrical engineering or similar background.
* You have great communication skills and can easily seek and find the needed information
* You have coordinating and planning abilities
* You have experience from working with Power Systems, Control & Protection
* Experience with Azure DevOps is valuable.
* As you will be part of a global business, it is important that you are fluent in English. Knowing Swedish language is meritorious.

**What we offer**

* Collective agreement
* Flexible working time
* Health care and wellness allowance
* Fantastic career possibilities within Hitachi Energy both within Sweden and globally
* Mentor to support you throughout the onboarding phase
* Various trainings and education supporting employee development
* Diversified company with over 70+ nationalities working in Sweden
* Supplementary compensation for parental leave
* Employee Benefit Portal with thousands of discounts and perks

title: Systemarkitekt inom Azure
description:
Vi söker en erfaren **Systemarkitekt inom Azure** som vill vara med och utveckla vår IT-miljö med fokus på moderna molnlösningar. I denna roll kommer du att ha en central position i att utforma och implementera skalbara, säkra och kostnadseffektiva lösningar i Microsoft Azure.


Förutom att vi levererar och utvecklar nya IT lösningar, jobbar vi också för ett större mål – att skapa socialt hållbara arbetsplatser i Sverige. Delar du vår vision och vill vara med oss på resan? Då är du välkommen med din ansökan.

  

Om ID06


ID06 Linkedin


Jobba hos oss

 **Om tjänsten som**


Som Systemarkitekt inom Azure hos ID06 ansvarar du för att skapa och vidareutveckla vår IT-infrastruktur i molnet. Du kommer att arbeta nära utvecklingsteam, IT-drift och andra intressenter för att säkerställa att våra lösningar är både tekniskt hållbara och affärsmässigt effektiva. Du får en nyckelroll i att vägleda organisationen genom strategiska molninitiativ, från design till implementation och förvaltning.


Tjänsten som Systemarkitekt ingår i ID06 IT Drift och Förvaltning och du rapporterar till ansvarig chef för detta område.  

  

  



**Arbetsuppgifter**

* Designa och implementera Azure-baserade infrastrukturlösningar enligt bästa praxis.


* Utveckla och underhålla arkitektur- och säkerhetsstrategier för Azure-miljön


* Arbeta med Infrastructure as Code (IaC), exempelvis Terraform eller Bicep, för automatisering av infrastruktur.


* Rådgivning och teknisk expertis i projekt där molnstrategier krävs.


* Samverka med utvecklingsteam för att säkerställa att lösningarna är skalbara och kostnadseffektiva.


* Övervaka och optimera prestanda, säkerhet och kostnad i Azure-miljön.


* Säkerställa regelefterlevnad (compliance) och implementera säkerhetsåtgärder enligt standarder som CIS, NIST och ISO 27001.



**Erfarenhet, utbildning och person**

* Djup kunskap om Microsoft Azure-plattformen och dess tjänster, såsom Azure Virtual Machines, Azure EntraID, Azure Networking, och Azure Security.


* Erfarenhet av molnarkitektur och designmönster, såsom mikroservices och containerlösningar (t.ex. Azure Kubernetes Service).


* Kompetens inom automatisering och deployment, t.ex. CI/CD med Azure DevOps, GitHub Actions eller liknande verktyg.


* Erfarenhet av övervakning och prestandaoptimering i molnmiljöer.


* God förståelse för nätverk och säkerhet i Azure, inklusive Zero Trust-modeller


* Kunskap om scripting och automatisering med PowerShell, Python eller liknande språk.


* Relevant certifiering såsom Azure Solutions Architect Expert är meriterande.


* Erfarenhet av att arbeta agilt och i tvärfunktionella team.

Vi lägger stor vikt på dina personliga egenskaper som är väsentliga för rollen som .


Som Systemarkitekt är det också av stor vikt att du behärskar både svenska och engelska.

 **Du erbjuds:**

  

* Möjligheten att vara en del av en dynamisk organisation i framkant av molnteknologi.
* En stimulerande arbetsmiljö med spännande projekt och tekniska utmaningar.
* Kontinuerlig kompetensutveckling och stöd för certifieringar.
* En utvecklande roll både lokalt och med flera kontaktytor
* Möjlighet att ta stort eget ansvar för olika processer
* Härliga kollegor
* Ett modernt kontor i öppet landskap mitt i centrala Stockholm, Göteborg och Jönköping

 **Omfattning:** Heltid tillsvidare, vi tillämpar 6 månaders provanställning


Innan anställning kommer en säkerhetskontroll genomföras.

title: C++ & Automatic Control Engineer (Stockholm, hybrid)
description:
Our newest business area, 5G Synchronization, is expanding and we want another collaborative and problem-solving Engineer with expertise in C++ and algorithm development/automatic control, to join our R&D team.


"This is an environment where engineers can be engineers" - Peers at Net Insight

*Want to learn more about our products and get to know our people? Make sure to check us out on* ***LinkedIn*** *and* ***Youtube****!*

**About your role**  

You will be working in the team responsible for the core synchronization functionality, with control algorithms and processing of data from time links, combined with an overall logic for handling different modes of operation.


The majority of the coding is done in modern C++ (20, 23) and you will be working with control and signal processing related methods, such as Kalman filters, Model Predictive Control, Event handling, and Mathematical Optimization.


The work involves algorithmic formulations, combined with software design and implementation in our product, mostly in C++ in TimeNodes, but also in other languages, such as Python, inside the Zyntai Director, which is a Kubernetes-based orchestration system for our TimeNodes.


You will collaborate with developers ranging from electronics and low-level embedded software to web-based management systems and UI.


Good to knows:

  

* We value work-life balance and have a hybrid work set-up (50/50)
* Full-time, permanent position
* Located in our HQ in Solna, Stockholm
* Our corporate language is English

**The product**


On a high level, our 5G time synchronization solution (Zyntai) enables faster and more secure 5G rollouts. This by providing 5G basestations with very accurate time - independent from GNSS.


A Zyntai Time Network consists of hundreds or even thousands of TimeNodes, sending time to each other in a hierarchical multi-link setup. Every TimeNode is gathering information from its neighbouring nodes (several thousands measurements per second and neighbour).


This information is used to understand the characteristics of the network, and to control the clock (oscillator) on the node using a control algorithm.  

  



**Your Profile**

  

Skills and experience:


Solid experience of modern C++ in a Linux environment  

* 
* Experience in analysis, design, and implementation of algorithms in a product development setting, in areas such as automatic control, signal processing, or numerical optimization, for example:
	+ Kalman filters
	+ Model Predictive Control
	+ Modelling and simulation
	+ Optimization
Networks (protocols, socket programming etc)  
* 
* Usage and development of tests and verification, in unit testing as well as on system level

**Our culture and beliefs:**


At Net Insight, **innovation**, **collaboration**, and **trust** are the cornerstones of our success. As one team, we are committed to delivering value to our customers, contributing to the growth and success of our company.


Together we create a dynamic and positive workplace where everyone is valued, engaged and empowered to make an impact

**How to apply and information about the process**


It's super-easy!


Upload you CV or use your LinkedIn profile, fill in the choice questions (no data entry) and upload relevant documentation of you choice - That's it.


We are recruiting continuously and we aim to get back to you with an initial decision within 10 days.


Note: We do not offer relocation support at this time.


Note 2: Background check will be part of our recruitment process.

 **This is NET INSIGHT**

*Net Insight (Nasdaq: NETI B) provides the highest performing, most open video transport and media cloud technology for content providers as the industry standard for flexibility and service across live contribution, distribution and remote production media workflows.*

*For over 25 years, the world’s leading content owners, broadcasters, production companies, service providers and enterprises have trusted Net Insight’s Emmy Award winning Nimbra technology to guarantee media delivery. Today, Net InsiEmmy Awardght partners with hundreds of customers in over 70 countries to ensure media flows across managed and unmanaged IP networks, and the cloud – from anywhere, to everywhere. It enables customers to get the best from any mix of virtualized, cloud and IP technology and is the only platform to support all the major industry standards, protocols and clouds.*

  

For more information, please visit *www.**netinsight.net*

  

 Buzz: Telecom, C++, Engineer, Developer, Programmer, SW Developer, Software Designer, Programmer, Telecom Engineer, 5G, Cloud, DevOps, SysAdmin, Synchronization, PTP protocol, IT Security /Trust Boundary /Firewalls, Agile project experience, Net Insight Products, Nimbra, Sverige, KTH, Reglerteknik, Reglertekniker

description:
Our client is a prominent Scandinavian technology consultancy and Microsoft Top Tier Partner. The business specialises in services that help large-scale organizations streamline and secure their software development processes and digital efforts through a full range of managed software products and consulting services. We are now looking for a Senior DevOps Engineer top join their busy, growing, and highly successful team.
 



  





**Senior DevOps Engineer** 




  





 Stockholm, hybrid working from home. 2-3 days in the office per week.
 



 55- 65K SEK per month plus pension, insurances and excellent benefits package.
 



  





**To be successful in this role:** 




 You will be a confident and senior DevOps Engineer with 4+ years of experience in Cloud DevOps or platform engineering and strong hands-on experience with Kubernetes and Cloud Services (AWS, Azure, or GCP).
 



  





 Other requirements for this role include:
 


* Experience with CI/CD tools and automation (Terraform, Helm, ArgoCD)
* Solid understanding of cloud security and scalability practices
* Proficiency in English and Swedish
* Valid working visa or Swedish citizenship



  





**Position summary:** 




 Our client is an innovative and forward-thinking technology company that offers a lot of growth opportunity, hackathons, social events, a great package and a leadership that is genuinely caring, supporting and highly responsive! This role will be perfect for a cloud expert who thrives on innovation and collaboration in a dynamic, high-trust environment.
 



  





**Job role and responsibilities:** 




 As a Senior DevOps Engineer, you will build critical cloud systems which are utilized by users in multiple sectors. Your focus will be on cloud infrastructure, automation, and container orchestration. You will utilise and implement Kubernetes and cloud platforms like AWS, Azure, or GC, driving operational excellence and platform reliability.
 



  





 Key responsibilities for this role include:
 


* Design and manage scalable cloud infrastructure (AWS, Azure, GCP)
* Implement Kubernetes-based solutions and container orchestration
* Automate deployments and manage CI/CD pipelines (Terraform, Azure DevOps)
* Ensure platform reliability, security, and performance optimization
* Collaborate closely with product and platform teams to drive automation and innovation



  





**Benefits:** 




 Extensive salary package based on experience
 



 Pension, health insurance, health benefits and more
 



 Remote/hybrid working options, flexibility
 



 Regular hackathons and knowledge-sharing labs
 



 Continuous learning, growth, and certification opportunities
 



 Trust-based, collaborative work environment

title: Senior AWS Cloud Engineer / Senior Platform Engineer
company_industry: Financial Services, Information Services, and Technology, Information and Media
description:
**This is Worldline** 




  





 Worldline helps businesses of all shapes and sizes to accelerate their growth journey - quickly, simply, and securely. We are the innovators at the heart of the payments technology industry, shaping how the world pays and gets paid. Our technology powers the growth of millions of businesses across 5 continents. And just as we help our customers accelerate their business, we are committed to helping our people accelerate their careers. Together, we shape the evolution.
 



  





  





**The Opportunity** 




  





 We are seeking a versatile Software Engineer to join our platform team, and work in a constantly evolving, dynamic, and agile environment, believing that the route to speed and stability is through automation. Teamwork, communication, and speaking your mind are of high importance to us, especially when they come with a curious mind, a willingness to grow, and exchange ideas and knowledge.
 



  





 In this role, along with a team of 8 members, you’ll set up AWS (Amazon Web Services) infrastructure which is handling millions of transactions worth billions of Euros. The team has a DevSecOps standpoint, owns, develops, and manages all Infrastructure as Code in AWS accounts, running 100s of containers and serverless functions; If you build it, you run it!
 



  





 If this looks exciting and you are eager to continue growing your professional capabilities with ongoing training and educational opportunities, come join us!
 



  





  





**Day-to-Day Responsibilities​** 




  




* Delivering the committed objectives that include adapting to any new needs to reach the goal
* On-call duty according to a rotating schedule
* Participate in your team's day-to-day activities including tools development, operations, maintenance, and support
* Being an active member in our agile events like daily stand-ups, planning, retros, and demos. etc.
* Foster team spirit, quality and technical agility



  





  





**Who Are We Looking For** 




  





 We look for big thinkers. People who can drive positive change, step up and show what’s next – people with passion, can-do attitude and a hunger to learn and grow. In practice this means:
 



  




* You have proven experience in systems engineering, automating infrastructure creation & maintenance tasks using Docker, Jenkins, Terraform\ CloudFormation, etc.
* You have a bachelor's or master's degree in computer science, distributed systems, software engineering, or another equivalent field
* You have previous experience in supporting/operating transaction driven and highly available platforms running microservices with 99.99% uptime
* You have a curiosity about security solutions such as WAF, IDS/IPS, Anti-DDOS, and SIEM
* You have work experience in programming (Python scripting) and an interest in automation
* You are passionate about cloud services, pay attention to details, handle many different partners and you are accountable to deliver results in a fast-paced environment



  





  





**Perks & Benefits** 




  





 At Worldline you’ll get the chance to be at the heart of the global payments technology industry and shape how the world pays and gets paid. On top of that, you will also:
 



  




* Being a part of a company guided by a strong purpose to do good and recognized as top 1% of the most sustainable companies in all sectors worldwide
* Health benefits contribution
* Health check – Every 2nd year
* Pension: BTP1 & BTP2
* Private Health Care Insurance (Euro Accident)
* Parental pay and 12 months pension during parental leave
* Opportunity to hybrid working according to company standard
* Benefit portal with many great offers, plus more.



  





  





**Shape the evolution** 




  





 We are pushing towards the next frontiers of payments technology, and we look for big thinkers to join our journey. People with passion, can-do attitude and a hunger to learn and grow. Here you’ll work with ambitious colleagues from around the world, take on unique challenges as a team, and make a real impact on the society. And with our empowering culture, strong technology and extensive training opportunities, we help you accelerate your career. Wherever you decide to go. Join our global team of over 18,000 innovators across 40+ countries, and shape a tomorrow that is yours to own.
 



  





**Learn more about life at Worldline at
 
 jobs.worldline.com**




  





**We are proud to be an Equal Opportunity employer. We do not discriminate based upon race, religion, color, national origin, sex (including pregnancy, childbirth, or related medical conditions), sexual orientation, gender identity, gender expression, age, status as an individual with a disability, or any applicable legally protected characteristics.**

title: Senior DevSecOps IAM Engineer
description:

 SEB is a leading northern European financial services group that takes a long-term perspective and supports its customers in good times and bad. In Sweden and the Baltic countries, SEB offers financial advice and a wide range of financial services. SEB's operations in Denmark, Finland, Norway, and Germany focus on corporate and investment banking. The bank has a presence in around 20 countries worldwide.
   




**Role Description**

 This is a full-time hybrid role for a Senior DevSecOps IAM Engineer located in Stockholm. The role involves designing, implementing, and managing IAM solutions, integrating security tools, monitoring security controls, and collaborating with cross-functional teams. Some work from home is acceptable in this role.
   




**Qualifications**
* Strong expertise in IAM solutions and Identity and Access Management
* Experience with DevSecOps practices and tools
* Knowledge of security controls and compliance standards
* Experience with security tool integrations
* Excellent problem-solving and analytical skills

title: Cloud Engineer
description:
* Help design, build and continuously improve the clients online platform.
* Research, suggest and implement new technology solutions following best practices/standards.
* Take responsibility for the resiliency and availability of different products.
* Be a productive member of the team.


**Requirements**
* 5+ years of software engineering with a strong focus on Cloud & DevOps.
* Deep experience with at least one major cloud provider (GCP preferred, followed by Azure or AWS).
* Strong grasp of scalable, high-quality software development, adhering to best practices in code structure, design patterns, and testing.
* Expert in Python, with the ability to refactor and optimize code efficiently. Advanced proficiency in at least one type-safe language (Go and/or Rust preferred).
* Hands-on experience with DevOps, CI/CD, and infrastructure automation using tools like GitHub Actions, GitLab CI, Terraform, and Docker.
* Strong understanding of security best practices in cloud and ML environments.
* Experience with containerization (Docker) and orchestration (Kubernetes) for scaling ML workflows.
* Familiarity with deep learning, graph neural networks (GNNs), large language models (LLMs), knowledge graphs, or retrieval-augmented generation (RAG).
* Proven experience building and maintaining ML platforms.
* Knowledge of ML orchestration tools like MLflow, Kubeflow, or Apache Airflow.
* Experience with model versioning, A/B testing, and model monitoring strategies.
* Exceptional English communication skills, enabling effective collaboration across teams and the ability to simplify complex technical topics for non-technical stakeholders.


**Benefits**
* A challenging, innovating environment.
* Opportunities for learning where needed.
